name: Adventure Simulator
description:
Note: I decided to do a personal game jam when I was in the car going on vacation, a while back ago. It's not the most complex game, but it's fun

You must find the magical sphere before the it's too late.

Patch 2.0: The patch adds on more wall, and the both walls have larger speeds. The sphere is also easier to see.

Controls: WASD, or Arrow Keys, Shift to sprint, Space to jump
